item.description: Elements of a Solution Design Actors and App Diagram System and Interfaces Record Sharing Role and Sharing Data Model Delivery & Deployment Data Migration & Interfaces

item.title: What do you know about functions?
item.description: For someone without the computer science background Knowing what a Function, Procedure and Method technically means: A function returns a value A procedure does not return a value A method is similar to a function is part of a Class. Methods are used almost exclusively in Object Oriented Programming ref: https://softwareengineering.stackexchange.com/questions/20909/method-vs-function-vs-procedure#:~:text=A%20function%20returns%20a%20value%2C%20but%20a%20procedure%20does%20not,to%20part%20of%20a%20class.
